name: Chemical Combiner
description: An excerpt from the Alchemistry Labs Catalog:$(br)Compounds and elements are nice, but they're so boring. They sit around and don't do anything. With our Combiner, you can rearrange the products of the Dissolver into much more exciting things! Got potatoes? You've got everything you need for Potassium Nitrate! Add a little carbon and sulfur, and KABOOM! Carrots have a lot of carbon for this - or even for diamonds! Carrots to carats!
